keyword: how many calories in a chicken wing
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Wing?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a chicken wing, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown per wing with preparation tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Wing?
assumptions: Bone-in, skin-on, roasted chicken wing; average size ~102 g including skin and bone; no added sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, skin inclusion, and seasonings. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken wing with skin provides about 99 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken wing with skin?
faqs.a: About 99 kcal for one roasted wing with skin.

faqs.q: Are chicken wings high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, one wing has ~9 g protein, making them a good source.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in a chicken wing?
faqs.a: Approximately 7 g total fat, including 2 g saturated fat per wing.
No carbs in plain roasted wings; breading or sauces add them.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in chicken wings?
faqs.a: Roasted or baked is lower (~99 kcal); fried can add 50-100 kcal due to oil.
